channel.title: Help needed
channel.description:
I was wondering if anyone knows where i can get a ds emulator that works well and downloadable nds games,and not from dgemu please?
Please and thanks, all will be appreciated, of course not flame =)
Frost21

item.title: Help needed
item.dc:creator: @SuperNewb SuperNewb
item.description:
@SuperNewb wrote:

On another topic

ds emulator = Double Screen Emulator. Seriously though, havent you guys ever played snes roms or anything? nds = Nintendo Double Screen(the next step up from a gameboy…), and I assume dgemu is a website with roms that dont work or something.

its “Dual Screen”

Read full topic

@system wrote:

yes, coatbridge explained it well,and dgemu has good roms but its a point sysetm and its Very hard to get the points…

@system wrote:

thanks, for the help coatbridge, and pie please stop spamming this topic , now i am mainly looking for some nds/ds roms… really would be appreciated,thanks to anyone Who even tries to help…

item.title: Help needed
item.dc:creator: @Pie_0wnz Pie 0wnz
item.description:
@Pie_0wnz wrote:

[quote=“anon95490785, post:1, topic:14126”][quote author=Pie 0wnz link=topic=21108.msg238630#msg238630 date=1158132573]
Could we have english…AKA somthing a non java scripter could understand.
[/quote]

Just becasue you dont understand him doesnt mean we don’t. Please, just shut the hell up. Im seriously reporting you to mopar, becasue every single one of your posts lacks proper tolerance, read through your posts and all you see is “Go suck a dick,” “go fuck yourself,” or whatever…

Anyways, Sorry I can’t help you frost. I used to have a lot of emulators and stuff but I havent really seen a ds one. Im sure there’s one out there(or in the making). I’ll take a quick search and see what I can find:
Well, this site looks like it’s worth looking around: http://www.ndsemulator.com/[/quote]

I asked him if he could tel me what he was saying a litter better god…Jack ass. get a fucking life

Read full topic
